alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 2:16PM MST until January 15 at 11:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST /11 PM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 9 AM PST /10 AM MST/ Friday to 10 PM PST /11 PM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Boaters should use extra caution when venturing onto area lakes. Strong winds over the open waters will make the lake water rough and hazardous...and may result in high waves which could tip or swamp smaller craft. For your personal safety, avoid the open waters and stay close to shore or around protected areas.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
